data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 Fall Creators Update version 1709 (Build 16299.64)
data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 7434, Version Hash: 73ba3238d57735140223a16c75d1296ffbd37251 af2c662
data.actual_result: The Ctrl +/- does a proper zoom, while pinching enlarges everything without respect to window size. See screens above. Additionally, pinch-zooming can hide the window title bar.
data.expected_result: Either the pinch-to-zoom should follow Ctrl +/- or should completely be disabled.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a computer with a touchscreen (Slightly necessary) - Open Discord to absolutely any page - Zoom using Ctrl +/- () - Zoom using a pinching gesture ()
